thread.title: Gossip | Fashion Flashback - MTV EMA Red Carpet 2014
thread.title_full: Gossip | Fashion Flashback - MTV EMA Red Carpet 2014 - entertainment.ie

author: Sheena McGinley
title: Gossip | Fashion Flashback - MTV EMA Red Carpet 2014
text:
With the 2015 MTV EMA's fast approaching this weekend, we're taking just a moment to look back at last year's event - if only to will it to be a better red carpet experience this year. There's no two ways of dressing it up; last year's red carpet was a rather muted affair...
To be perfectly honest, it didn't exactly set the world alight. If fact, it barely fizzled - largely due to the lack to stars on display. The preferred colour of choice was black, which didn't help matters much. Laura Whitmore did try to add a bit of oomph to proceedings by standing like this, and by wearing the entire contents of a kohl mine around her eyes, which was appreciated.
Other notables on the night include Ariana Grande (because she's one of the only current names to show), Nicki Minaj (she had to turn up given she was hosting the thing), good ole reliable Ed Sheeran, model Jourdan Dunn, and someone claiming to be Emile Sande.
And now to the highlight of the night... The Hoff in a kilt. Rocking half a tonne of concealer... What a pro.
One of the most notable looks of the night came from Skylar Grey. We may not be completely up to speed regarding her work, and it's refreshing to see someone apart from Ed Sheeran look overtly comfortable on a red carpet. Although her combat genie pants made from municipal building carpet look more itchy than comfy.
ROLL ON 2015!
